Html:
When i am creating a PDF from a dynamic excel sheet using PHO Excel then within using DomPDF to then output as a PDF.

But when i view the PDF i have this border around the edge of the outputted content. How can i remove this border.

It seems to be placing it around the excel page created them converting to a PDF
Well have sorted this out, within my templated excel sheet, i went to the layout tab, then in the view section unticked the gridlines, and this solved my issue
